archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_1018
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a PO, I want to be able to provide a unique code to a customer to use on a third party site

properties.value: [CLM] CLM enables generating coupon series feature as well as can import series from external provider and issue those coupons to particular customers OOTB feature Who should generate codes? What type of codes should be generated?

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
